data.name: BLOCK WARRIORS: Definitive Edition
data.detailed_description:
Garlands city is surrounded by crime, the true owners of the city are violent gangs with their personal rules and procedures. The city is divided into territories that belong to one of the gangs, each of which controls its own plot, which it is better for a stranger not to meddle with if his life is dear to him. After all, it's the way it is here, if no one has a reputation for being a harsh gangster, then anyone who was given a gun by his older gang brothers only yesterday will shoot you.



Block Warriors: Definitive Edition is a game that shows life in a criminal area as it is. You play as an ordinary fighter who has great ambitions and strives for more. Make your way to the top of the criminal world, make your own orders, create your own gang and keep the whole city at bay.



The plot of the game is much more than just skirmishes with enemy groups in the districts, because the main character will have to go through a lot of different tests on his way. The game Block Warriors: Definitive Edition raises difficult questions about responsibility to relatives, loyalty to the ideals of street brotherhood and betrayal of loved ones. Uncompromising, seasoned drama about life in the ghetto will not leave anyone indifferent.



An explosive action movie in which dynamic shootings and brutal reprisals are harmoniously combined. Incredible racing at high speeds: conquer the city streets and cut the sea waves using a variety of exotic cars, sports motorcycles and speedboats.



Garlands will become an unsurpassed playground for you: participate in the life of your native area and take your place under the sun.

Features of the game:


  • Tense atmosphere showing real life in the ghetto. Be always on the alert, because death can overtake you instantly. Think twice before entering enemy territory.
  • Block Warriors: Definitive Edition is an improved and expanded version of the game, which has received recognition and positive reviews from millions of players.
  • Real gang war. No game has ever shown so plausibly the harsh realities of gang battles for territory and influence.
  • Music. The best compositions of RAP, Hip Hop, Phonk genres are waiting for you, emphasizing the style and atmosphere of street crime.
  • Rich game world. Explore, find something new, or just contemplate. Garlands lives by its own laws, street wars will never end.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10
